import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-knowmore', templateUrl: './knowmore.component.html', styleUrls: ['./knowmore.component.css'] }) export class KnowmoreComponent { } Foodhub

Restaurant App

Hello Visitor !

We do not cook, we create your emotions !

Welcome to Randha Hotel, where food is love and every guest is family. We are excited to share our culinary passion with you. Please, come in and savor the moment.

17

We are doing more than you expect

We hope you are doing well and would like to share an exciting news. If you're looking for a place to dine-in and relish a sumptuous meal after your exhilarating trek near Bhandardara, we'd like to introduce you to our HOTEL RANDHA which has recently been opened near Randha waterfall. -> We serve both veg and non-veg
meals.
-> Thali system is available.
-> Unlimited veg / non veg buffet for lunch and dinner is also available on advanced intimation.
-> Group booking facility is available.

There are numerous amazing places to visit nearby our hotel. We would like to list a few for you to explore. 1. Randha waterfall (0 km) 2. Umbrella falls ( 9 km) 3. Reverse waterfall (9.2 km) 4. Panjre falls (18 km) 5. Kalsubai (Highest Peak of Maharashtra) (12 km) 6. Ratangad (18.8 km) 7. Harishchandragad (28.7 km) 8. Alang-Madan-Kulang (27.8) 9. Pabargad (9.2 km) 10. Amruteshwar temple (21 km) 11. Sandhan valley (Valley of Shadows) (31 km) 12. Wilson dam (Spillway gate - 7 km) 13. Pemgiri Banyan Tree (Biggest Banyan tree in Asia- 47 km) 14. Bhandardara Lake (Lake Arthur - 8.2 km) and many other marvellous places.




01

At the heights

We are located at heights on the hills of Igatpuri.

02

Fresh ingredients

We serve fresh food with veggies bought straight from the farms.

03

Pick Ups

We provide the facility of food pickups.

04

Professional, experienced chefs

We provide the best quality food with chefs who have an experience of over 5 years.

05

The highest standards of service

We might take some delay in serving you food as we prepare it fresh.



Most popular places to Visit nearby !

Randha Waterfalls

kms0

Kalsubai - Highest peak of Maharashtra (1,646 metres)

kms12

Umbrella Waterfalls

kms9

Wilson Dam - Spillway Gate

kms7

Lake Arthur - Camping

kms6

Sandha Valley - Valley of Shadows

kms13

What do our customers say?

A short glimpse through our reviews.

Very tasty

This restaurant is my absolute favorite! The atmosphere is so chill and cool, and the staff genuinely care about your experience. They know their stuff and go the extra mile to make customers happy. The food is delicious, and for the prices, it's 100% worth it. I love this place and will definitely be back. Highly recommended!

Raju Sutar

Taste of homemade food

Delicious food and amazing service also the place had a wonderful atmosphere. I highly recommend it when you are in bhandardara. Must visit place

Rutuja Thakur
